attributes.action: Ban mk Dons fans from all football matches
attributes.additional_details: The fans of this club have mocked the deaths of people who died in a fire and are not even real fans because there club hasn't been around long enough to have them
attributes.background: Mk Dons fans are a utter disgrace too football and should not be allowed to attend games anymore.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. The UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for banning football fans from football matches.
